name: mcu-server
description: Client utilising CloudConnect to subscribe and publish messages to thing topics

scripts.sub: node lib/cognito.js -u <username> -P <password> -v -a 064445364562 -e prod -s 'sub/UIT IFI course/pau001/00000273' -p 'pub/UIT IFI course/pau001/00000273'

author: Pontus Aurdal
